title: Diamond-Studded Gold Kangan - Embrace Modern Elegance
materials: High-Quality Cubic Zirconia. Features our signature Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: Sleek, contemporary bangle design with diamond-shaped gold accents. Four brilliant-cut Cubic Zirconia stones are meticulously prong-set to maximize sparkle. The slim profile allows for comfortable wear and stacking with other bangles.
colors: Warm yellow gold with dazzling white Cubic Zirconia highlights.
occasions: and modern celebrations. Perfect for adding a touch of sophistication to your ensemble.
description: This Kangan seamlessly blends modern aesthetics with the timeless appeal of gold. The durable construction ensures lasting beauty, while the sparkling Cubic Zirconia stones add a touch of luxury without the high price tag. A versatile piece that complements both traditional and contemporary outfits.
